last_phrase: In conclusion, despite the once prevalent disbelief and ridicule of mesmerism and magnetism, it has now been proven through numerous experiments and studies, and even recognized and utilized by the medical community. While there may be concerns about the misuse or potential dangers of hypnotism and magnetism, these can be addressed through proper regulation and training rather than outright banning. As we continue to expand our understanding of the human mind and its capabilities, it is important to remain open-minded and receptive to new ideas and possibilities.
